thread.title: Universal unveils entire Halloween Horror Nights 2015 lineup
thread.title_full: Universal unveils entire Halloween Horror Nights 2015 lineup

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Universal unveils entire Halloween Horror Nights 2015 lineup
text:
The Universal Studios event runs on 30 select nights between Sept. 18 and Nov. 1. It will feature a record nine haunted-house mazes. Among the five recently revealed are: Jack the Clown returns to Halloween Horror Nights 25 
Jack the Clown returns to Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Orlando this fall. 
Jack the Clown returns to Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Orlando this fall. 
+ American Werewolf in London -- The 1981 horror film (and 2013 haunted house) comes back to life, featuring a expanded "more ferocious" pack, Universal says. 
+ Jack Presents 25 Years of Monsters and Mayhem -- A walk down meat-grinding memory lane. 
+ Body Collectors: Recollections -- The hunt for human parts visits Shadybrook Asylum. 
+ Asylum in Wonderland 3D -- "This time around, youâ€™ll follow the white rabbit through the looking glass and into a murderous 3-D Wonderland," says a post on the official Universal Orlando theme parks blog.
